name: remnux-cli

scripts.pkg:build: npx @yao-pkg/pkg -t node22-linux --out-dir release package.json && cd release && mv remnux-cli remnux-cli-linux
scripts.pkg:sign: cd release && rm -f remnux-cli-linux.sha256.asc && gpg --armor --clearsign --digest-algo SHA256 -u 28CD19DB remnux-cli-linux.sha256 && rm remnux-cli-linux.sha256
scripts.pkg:nosign: npm run pkg:prep && npm run pkg:build && npm run pkg:hash
scripts.pkg: npm run pkg:nosign && npm run pkg:sign
